p.k: Classic, Art Russia (1923). Hrají: Grigori Aleksandrov, Maxime Strauch, Vera Yanowkova. Režie: Sergei Eisenstein.
p.d: Filmic insert to Eisenstein's modernized, free adaptation of Ostrovskiy's 19th-century Russian stage play, "The Wise Man" ("Na vsyakogo mudretsa dovolno prostoty"). The anti-hero Glumov tries to escape exposure in the midst of acrobatics, derring-do, and farcical clowning. Several members of Eisenstein's troupe at the legendary "Proletkult" stage theatre in Moscow briefly appear in this little film.
